useCase.name: User Registration
useCase.description: Allows a user to register on the platform.

preconditions.precondition: User is accessing the registration feature.

successEndConditions.condition: User successfully registers on the platform.

mainSequence.step: FrontEnd shows registration form to User.
User fills in the registration form.
FrontEnd shows consent form to User.
FrontEnd posts the registration data to MD.
MD resolves the registration request successfully.
FrontEnd shows success message to User.
